name: cucumberstudio-mcp
description: MCP server for Cucumber Studio API integration - access test scenarios, action words, and execution data
long_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides LLM access to Cucumber Studio's testing platform. This server enables AI assistants to retrieve test scenarios, action words, test runs, and project information from Cucumber Studio. Features include project management, scenario browsing, reusable test steps access, and test execution monitoring with comprehensive error handling and type safety.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Your Cucumber Studio API access token. Get this from your Cucumber Studio account settings under API tokens.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Your Cucumber Studio client ID. This is provided when you create an API application in Cucumber Studio.

uid.title: User ID
uid.description: Your Cucumber Studio user ID. This can be found in your account settings or profile information.

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_projects
tools.description: List all projects accessible to the authenticated user with optional pagination and filtering

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific project including settings and metadata

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_scenarios
tools.description: List test scenarios in a project with support for folder filtering and pagination

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_scenario
tools.description: Get detailed scenario information including steps, tags, and execution history

tools.name: cucumberstudio_find_scenarios_by_tags
tools.description: Search and filter scenarios by tags across projects for targeted test execution

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_action_words
tools.description: List reusable action words (test steps) with pagination and filtering capabilities

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_action_word

tools.name: cucumberstudio_find_action_words_by_tags

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_test_runs
tools.description: List test execution runs with filtering by status, dates, and execution environments

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_test_run
tools.description: Get detailed test run information including execution status and results summary

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_test_executions
tools.description: Get individual test execution results and detailed failure information

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_builds
tools.description: List builds associated with test executions for CI/CD integration tracking

tools.name: cucumberstudio_get_build
tools.description: Get detailed build information including test results and execution metadata

tools.name: cucumberstudio_list_execution_environments
tools.description: List available execution environments for test runs and build configurations
